title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS update - Airbus A310 - review
description:
In this video we will have look at the Airbus A310 which has been made available as part of the 40th Anniversary update of MSFS which has been released a few days back.

We will start with the external review and will continue with the review of the individual cockpit parts.

0:00 intro
0:10 external review
4:45 start of cockpit review
5:10 review of the Flypad/Electronic Flight Bag (EFB)
16:38 review buttons on the ceiling
22:05 review of the pilot instruments
25:24 review autopilot options
28:01 review thrust and communication systems
